ai-thag3.15:1.1_0: “In the past you have already done
ai-thag3.15:1.4_0: and afterwards they’re tormented by regrets.
ai-thag3.15:2.1_0: You should only say what you would do;
ai-thag3.15:2.2_0: you shouldn’t say what you wouldn’t do.
ai-thag3.15:3.1_0: Oh! Extinguishment is so very blissful,
ai-thag3.15:3.2_0: as taught by the fully awakened Buddha:
